markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Piercing Whistle Snare](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1490)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
<trait label="Snare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=146" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Monsters of Myth](/Sources.aspx?ID=107) pg. 113</row>

**Price** 45 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This snare forces air through several high-pitched, whistle-like pipes or reeds. The shrill noise can be heard clearly up to 2 miles away but is most intense near the snare's trigger. The snare deals 4d6 sonic damage (DC 22 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save) to creatures within 10 feet; a creature that fails this save is [deafened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=8) for 1 round (1 hour on a critical failure). The triggering creature is deafened for 1 minute on a failure, or 1 hour on a critical failure.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Piercing Whistle Snare

The shrill noise can be heard clearly up to 2 miles away but is most intense near the snare's trigger.
